title: Dethrone
content:
Dethrone Level 5 Necromancy Spell 30~80 Damage 10d6+20 Necrotic Shred a foe's very essence by pulling on strands of the Weave. On Save: Targets still take half damage. 30m CON Save Long Rest Action Level 5 Spell Slot

Level 5 Necromancy Spell

10d6+20 Necrotic

Shred a foe's very essence by pulling on strands of the Weave.

On Save: Targets still take half damage.

30m CON Save Long Rest

Dethrone is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Dethrone can only be obtained from Scroll of Dethrone in Karsus sect
